info.name: CoWin APIs
info.description:
Documenting the usage of CoWin APIs to book a session.

Reach out [@ScientificGhosh](https://twitter.com/ScientificGhosh)

Ref: [CoWin API Reference on API Setu](https://apisetu.gov.in/public/marketplace/api/cowin/cowin-protected-v2#/)

header.value: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/90.0.4430.93 Safari/537.36

request.description:
We hit this endpoint to trigger the backend subroutine responsible for sending an OTP to the registered phone number.

Update 07/05/2021: The `secret` is sent as a part of the request as now the backend encodes the User-Agent string while generating the JWT - something that was missing on the public API documentation. This `secret` was found from a browser network request payload when logging into the CoWin portal.

header.value: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/90.0.4430.93 Safari/537.36

request.description: We use a SHA-256 representation of the OTP to get a JSON Web Token to authenticate further requests.

header.value: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/90.0.4430.93 Safari/537.36

request.description: We use this endpoint to get a list of states along with their identifiers.

response.name: Get States

request.description: We use this endpoint to get a list of districts in a state.

response.name: Get Districts

request.description: We use this endpoint to get a list of slots by district identifiers at centres where vacancies exist.

response.name: Get Sessions by District

header.value: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/90.0.4430.93 Safari/537.36
